message.body: the best part of this week so far is when one of my relatives mixed up the words twitch and jerk and said "the ocean was so cold it made me twerk"
The older relative, the better that story is. Haha.
she's like... 45?
Loveeee it.
also you know how sometimes lamps hung from the ceiling have cords strung through a chain that sorta loops off of it to the wall?
Kinda...
Okay yes. Also, loving the streamer action.
apparently it's called "swag". by opa, who's 88.
and thank you! haha
Swagpa.
exactly! so when sage was putting the streamers up she accidentally pulled the chain off the wall and she comes over to me and goes "i was trying to decorate but the swag died so i twerked"
HAHAHHAHA
she was very excited you thought that was funny :)
Lauuuuuren.
kkkkkkkkkkk
I had an interesting experience last night.
i worry whenever i get these
Well I made a half good half bad decision. I hung out with pj. The actually time spent together was phenommmm. But the argument that proceeded it was not.
oh dear
Yeah. My name was used (if you couldn't tell by that tumblr post). And I felt super super awkward.
that is awkward. so he thinks you're his girl?!
No. His roommate screamed 'AND YOU'RE BACK THERE FUCKIN DEVINS GIRL. YOU KNOW HE LIKES HER'
oh god. wait, who's his roommate? also so you actually fucked him? i need to take a shower but i have lots of questions
This guy named Eric. And yes.

while i was in the shower it occurred to me that maybe we shouldn't be so harsh on the "devin's girl" thing. like, basically that's just semantics because we know he meant "the girl that devin like/d". and it's sorta respectable that a mutual friend of pj and devin would be concerned. bro code, and all.
also i tried to send that text an hour ago and couldn't get reception
It just still pisses me off, because its not like I was ever WITH devin. Like, 3 years ago he told me he liked me, but he never did anything about it. Plus, if
he was going to say that he should also make care not to scream it while I'm in another room...made me feel kinda awkward.
Pj made is clear they had discussed this situation already though. He had the go ahead.
ah, that changes things. so who was actually arguing?
Pj and Eric. It had NOTHIG to do with me.
oh. weird.
I know. That's another reason it pissed me off. Their original argument had nothing to do with me.
sorry girl. :(
ewww
Also. I bought a very special board game today at goodwill. We will play soooon.
what is?!
Scene it: Harry potter edition :D
funnn!
